help-file.title: "GREATER EARTHEN GRASP"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Elemental
"Greater Earthen Grasp" causes many earthen fists to burst from the ground grasping as many victims as they can, squeezing the life out of them for serious damage and possible paralysis.
